title: Ashok Leyland bags single largest order of 2,104 fully built buses from Maharashtra government
description: Ashok Leyland has secured a big order from MSRTC for 2,104 Viking passenger buses worth Rs 981.45 Crores. These buses, compliant with CMVR standards, will feature advanced technology like iGEN6 BS VI OBD II, with production ensuring enhanced safety and comfort. This partnership underscores Ashok Leyland's commitment to advancing public transportation.
